1.11.a4.0:
HUGE UPDATE!!

- Better progression: ability levels, level 4 choices, new GUIs
- Get bending in survival, scrolls
- Flying bison, otter penguins, human benders
- And much more!!

Full changelog available at: av2.io/a4.0-changelog

1.11.a5.0:
Massive SPECIALTY BENDING update

- Added Icebending, Combustionbending, Lightningbending, and Sandbending
- Added ostrich horses, ostrich armor, and more
- Added Power Rating and Performance system for heated battles
- Tons of bugfixes & improvements, full changelog available at: bit.ly/2CsUEJH
1.11.a5.1: Critical patch which fixes crash when using skill menu
1.11.a5.2: Fixes server crashing and many other bugs. Added in-game announcement system.
